dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: How's Clive? I do hope you gave him my regards.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Got a proposition for you... from Clive.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's talk about something else.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll get back to you on that.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, this oughta be good.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: What does he mean to offer in exchange for his no-account life?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who better to handle the cleaning than Clive? The SubLight idiots mucking it up now?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Running a factory is hard, tedious work.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Clive is willing to be your cleaner if you leave the factory to him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never mind.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Point taken. Good help is hard to come by. Plus, Clive doesn't seem the type to upchuck his boarst during dismemberment.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Still, you're asking me to walk away from easy money.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: So are a lot of things in life. And your point is?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Clive is offering a cut of the profits and free body disposal every Tuesday, 3 a.m.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why not leave the headache to someone else?

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: All right. Color me convinced.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Reckon I owe you a finders fee. Don't spend it all in one place - unless it's here.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well? I'm half-listening.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's enough for now.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: True enough, I got bodies piling up, drawing attention where they ought not to be.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: But if I take the factory, I don't need Clive to dispense of my messes. Can appoint someone to handle it myself.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Tell Clive I don't haggle. Right as you gut him.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure.
